name: Primacy Alpha
description:
---- Very early stage of development ----

Buy now and get all future updates!

Note: there is no tutorial, it is quite unpolished and has several bugs. If despite this you want to try it out, please feel free to buy it or send me an email at johanronnas@gmail.com to get an explanation as well as someone to play with.

---- PRIMACY -----

This is a turnbased, 2 player online strategy game. Build your buildings, train your units and defeat the enemy. On an hexagonal map, movement and positioning of both units and buildings is key to victory, as you will have to balance offense and defense.

----------------------------------------

For more information about both the game and the development process, check out my youtube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCCknQ6RjSwNu2DHW...
